# AudioDeviceStop(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

- [ AudioDeviceStop(_:_:) ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicestop(_:_:))

-  AudioDeviceStop(_:_:) 

Function# AudioDeviceStop(_:_:)

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.0+

```
func AudioDeviceStop(
    _ inDevice: AudioObjectID,
    _ inProcID: AudioDeviceIOProcID?
) -> OSStatus
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicestop(_:_:)#parameters)

`inDevice`The AudioDevice to stop the IOProc on.

`inProcID`The AudioDeviceIOProcID to stop.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicestop(_:_:)#return-value)

An OSStatus indicating success or failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicestop(_:_:)#discussion)

Stops IO for the given AudioDeviceIOProcID.

## [See Also](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicestop(_:_:)#see-also)
